description:
Somewhere on the vast web of the Internet, someone brought you to this article.

You may be looking for:Jesus, who is regarded as theMessiah(savior) inChristianity.All-Loving Hero: For heroes that love everyone.Messianic Archetype: For characters that are messiahs.TheMessiahoratorio composed byGeorge Frederic Handel.

Please change the link that brought you here to point to one of these articles.
